sentences.en: A bar on horseshoe magnet is called a permanent magnet.
sentences.cn: 棒形或马蹄形磁体称为永磁体.

sentences.en: a horseshoe bend in the river
sentences.cn: 河道中的马蹄形弯曲

sentences.en: A horseshoe has always been considered a good luck char.
sentences.cn: 马蹄铁一直被视作一种吉祥物.

sentences.en: A horseshoe has always been considered a good luck charm.
sentences.cn: 马蹄铁一直被视为一种吉祥物.

sentences.en: And all for the want of a horseshoe nail.
sentences.cn: 所有都是因为少了个马掌钉.

sentences.en: Bend the bar into a horseshoe.
sentences.cn: 把铁条弯成马蹄形。

sentences.en: Ferries churn the waters of Howe Sound from Langdale to Horseshoe Bay.
sentences.cn: 渡船搅起豪湾的海水，从兰代尔驶向霍斯舒湾。

sentences.en: I tried to beat that blackjack game at the Horseshoe Club in Brooklyn.
sentences.cn: 我想赢布鲁克林那个马蹄俱乐部的21点.

sentences.en: It lays its eggs (like the one above) only on horseshoe vetch, a European perennial.
sentences.cn: 它只在欧洲多年生植物马蹄野豌豆上产卵（如上图）。

sentences.en: Late come of true facts, be like suddenly horseshoe, ah of shooting the head, pain!
sentences.cn: 迟来的真莫道不消魂，就像突然击中头部的马蹄铁，哎，痛啊！

sentences.en: Some Horseshoe bats can detect differences as slight as 0 . 0001 KHz.
sentences.cn: 一些马蹄铁形蝙蝠能探测到细微至0.0001千赫的差别.

sentences.en: The blacksmith came out of the forge to fit the horseshoe.
sentences.cn: 铁匠从铁工厂出来安装马蹄铁.

sentences.en: The blacksmith is forging the horseshoe.
sentences.cn: 铁匠正在打造马蹄铁.

sentences.en: The immature neutrophil has a nonsegmented nucleus in shape of a horseshoe.
sentences.cn: 很幼稚的嗜中性粒细胞的核呈马蹄形,不分叶.

sentences.en: The magnetic state of a bar magnet or a horseshoe magnet is extremely complicated.
sentences.cn: 条形磁铁或马蹄形磁铁的磁态是极其复杂的.

sentences.en: The smith forged the horseshoe with great skill.
sentences.cn: 那铁匠非常熟练地锻造马蹄铁。

sentences.en: The water cuts the alluvial banks of the " lower " river into deep horseshoe curves.
sentences.cn: 河水把下游那些 冲积 的河岸冲成很深的马蹄形曲线.

sentences.en: Their ability to go on a sustained eating binge while at the bay is due entirely to another creature: the horseshoe crab. These bizarre animals are among the oldest on Earth.
sentences.cn: 让它们能不停地在特拉华湾狂吃的原因，完全是因为老天爷在那里安排了另一种生物：马蹄蟹，地球上最古老的奇怪的动物。

sentences.en: This " horseshoe " was coated with varnish and a layer of copper wire was wrapped around it.
sentences.cn: 他把一根铁棒弯成了马蹄铁型,在 马蹄铁 上涂了清漆并在上面绕了一层铜导线.

sentences.en: To throw or toss something, such as a ball, horseshoe, or bale.
sentences.cn: 抛，扔，投：投或抛出某物，如球、马蹄铁或大包。

trans.tran_en: a U-shaped piece of iron that is fixed onto the bottom of a horse’s foot
